info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Flatrock River at Saint Paul.
Big Walnut Creek near Reelsville.
Big Blue River at Carthage.
Buck Creek at Acton.
Sugar Creek at New Palestine.
Mill Creek near Cataract.
Fall Creek near Fortville.
Fall Creek at Millersville.
Wildcat Creek at Kokomo.
Wildcat Creek near Jerome.
Mississinewa River near Ridgeville.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Youngs Creek at Amity.
Sugar Creek near Edinburgh.
.Heavy rainfall across central Indiana from several events over the past week has brought minor to significant flooding to several rivers, creeks and streams in central Indiana.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Flatrock River at Saint Paul.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs along Flatrock River in southern Shelby County. Towns affected include Geneva and Flat Rock.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 PM EDT Sunday was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 1245 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
